item.title: Psuedo Random Functions
item.description: A simple explanation on what Psuedo Random numbers are, and how we can securely send information using PRF. Introduction In a lot of computational and mathematical programs, random numbers are important. Might be just to take probability, to shuffle a deck of cards or to simulate a game. The only way to get a number which is truly random is to depend on certain physical phenomenon which is unpredictable, like radioactive decay of isotopes or airwave static.

item.title: Reduced Row Echelon Form
item.description: The blog explains how to find reduced row-echelon form of a matrix in python
